requirement.en: If the only monsters in your Graveyard are High Dragon and/or Dragon Type monsters, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Draw 1 card. Then, if you have "The Copy" or "Back To The Fusion" in your Graveyard, this card's name becomes "The Dragias" this turn.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
